DOC.brief_summary: - To estimate dopamine receptor occupancy aripiprazole use computer simulation - To measure dopamine receptor occupancy aripiprazole patient treat antipsychotic - To validate simulation result compare receptor occupancy simulation patient
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis schizophrenia treat aripiprazole risperidone change dose antipsychotic least 6 week total PANSS score 80 Other psychiatric disorder rather schizophrenia history head trauma positive urine hCG antidepressant , anticholinergic mood stabilizer
